WorkItem.Description: Because the Reporting of Wsus Package Publisher is so much cooler than the Reporting of the normal WSUS-Console we would like to be able to also show the normal Microsoft WSUS Updates in Wsus Package Publisher. Probably lust a Checkbox under Tools > Settings > Updates.

Comments.Message:
> Probably lust a Checkbox under Tools > Settings > Updates

I think it will be more complicated than this.
